nodes.text: Yan Vrees was a male Gran who lived on Hok during the waning years of the Galactic Republic.

A smuggler and card shark, he owed a large sum of credits to Jabba Desilijic Tiure as the result of losing a high-stakes game of sabacc to the Hutt crimelord. After Yrees bolted in 32 BBY, Jabba posted a bounty on him, which was collected by the Mandalorian-turned bounty hunter Jango Fett.
In the Game his name is "Yan Vrees". While the strategy Guide says his name as Yan Yrees.
